channel.title: New home added On my server, Thought I'd keep you Updated :)
channel.description:
[b]New home area added, 2 portals added, and npcs.
[u]Added NPCs[/u]
[ul][li]Paledin - Drops God armor Randomly along with holiday / rare Items. ( around 2k HP )[/li] [li]Guardian Monkey - Level 169, around 600 HP drops holiday Items.[/li] [li]Flambeed - A boss, Drops God armor and Godswords EVERY time ( usually crowded )[/li][/ul]
[b][u]PICS[/u] shops, accessed by portal. [img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg49/Owner_Range/shops.jpg[/img] Drop Party Island, accessed by portal. [img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg49/Owner_Range/partyisle.jpg[/img] starting area, found in emotes. [img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg49/Owner_Range/newhome2.jpg[/img] Some npcs that drop good, found at home. [img]http://i245.photobucket.com/albums/gg49/Owner_Range/newhome.jpg[/img]
Post what you think of the update and yes, I AM allowed to post this it is the development of my server.[/b]
[b][u]Server News[/u]
[ul][li]The REAL Abbysalscape server ( Mine ) Is thinking about combining 2 worlds with the zapto server.[/li] [li]Yesterday We reached a record limit of 86 players.[/li] [li]ALOT of more items to be added :)[/li][/ul]

item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

I don’t really mind. It’s not my business. If you have permission from a moderator then you should probably pace a quote of that at the top of the thread. Other than that, you can do as you please.

item.title: New home added On my server, Thought I'd keep you Updated :)
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Technically, it is advertisement. If you seen a thread full of pictures of a new release of Coca Cola, explaining the new designs and such, would you call it advertisement?

Perhaps not. But then, if you looked in the thread-maker’s signature, and it had something like ‘www.cocacola.co.uk’ in it, would you deem it advertising then?

I would. Basically, this isn’t anything to do with development or help. I don’t mean to bring you down, and I’m not trying to get this thread locked; I’m just backing up that guy, who was indeed correct.

Read full topic
item.source: New home added On my server, Thought I'd keep you Updated :)

item.title: New home added On my server, Thought I'd keep you Updated :)
item.dc:creator: @1_0wner_1 1 0wner 1
item.description:
@1_0wner_1 wrote:

It’s not advertisement. I NEVER MENTIONED THE IP! and I didnt advertise the server and yeh I already brought This upto A mod, Good luck getting this closed. I dont get you guys, dont you have anything better to do? advertisement would be liek “EY! come to my server THIS other server like men kind of like icraft the junior member” That would be advertisement

ANd yeh the server name is on the picture but NOT THE IP because I already had a problem with a few leechers getting pictures of my server and posting downloads that were actually keyloggers saying it was their server.

Read full topic

item.title: New home added On my server, Thought I'd keep you Updated :)
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

First of all.
This would be called an advertisement.
It has your server name all over it.
Second of all.
Please look to the rules if you don’t know wether or not you are ALLOWED to post it.
Thirs of all.
You need to ask permission to post things like this.
Read the rules.
There here for a reason.

Moparisthebest.com and Moparscape.org Rules

Primary rules

  1. If you don’t have anything nice to say, don’t say anything at all.

  2. Use common sense.

The staff reserves the right to interpret these primary rules any way we see fit, for example while posting child porn is not specifically against the rules, it should be common sense that it is not allowed.

Ideals

Rule 1:
We are not anti-leech. If you respect our community and our ideas, feel free to ask questions and they will be kindly answered if you follow other rules. Answer to questions that others ask if you know the answer or remain silent!

Rule 2:
We don’t talk about things we don’t know. This is an informative, not a misinformative community.

Rule 3:
We respect each other and other communities. We don’t flame each other or other communities. We don’t fight on the forums.

Rule 4:
We don’t care about post count alone. If someone has high post count and most of it is spam, we hate them. If someone has high post count with informative posts, we love them. The higher count, the more we hate/love them.

Rule 5 - Rep:
Do not ask for rep, do not offer rep for services, do not give rep for meaningless messages. Rep shall not be abused.

Rep is a little reward for helping the community, it is not suppose to be given freely.

Posts / Topics

Rule 6:
We don’t make spelling mistakes on purpose. We use “you” not “u”, we use “why” not “y” etc.

Rule 7:
We don’t make posts that contain not useful information. Posts like “cool”, “lol”, “yeah” and “I agree” don’t contain anything useful for others. We are not fans of off topic, unless it contains something smart or funny. Most of things spammers find funny are actually not funny at all.

Rule 8:
Nothing to do with private servers belongs on moparisthebest.com, use moparisthebest.com/smf for these things.

Rule 9:
DO NOT post or upload any copyrighted materials, ie deobs, clients or any other sort (however if you were to link to a file that was uploaded somewhere else or post code in the pasteBin, well, I would have no control over that right? )

Buying / Selling

Rule 10:
We do not sell anything on this site with the exception of SCAR scripts. SCAR Scripts must be verified, check the script sales board for more info.

Accounts

Rule 11:
We only have one Forum account per person for Moparisthebest.com and Moparscape.org. If you get banned, email an admin, or get a friend to contact an admin. If you have trouble logging in, click ‘forgot my password.’

Linking / Advertisement

Rule 12:
We don’t advertise other sites or communities unless we ask and receive permission to from a Gmod or Admin. We don’t post links to sites that are not in safe sites list on Moparisthebest.com main page.

Rule 13:
We never advertise via the PM system whether the site is approved or not.

Rule 14:
We never have misleading links in our signatures or posts. If a link says google.com, we expect it to take us to google.com.

We’re not asking much,

Thank you

Moparisthebest and Moparscape Moderation Team

Read full topic
